headline: BDO USA Named a Workday Partner, Enhancing Finance and HR Service Offerings
summary: CHICAGO, August 06, 2025--BDO USA, one of the nation's leading accounting and advisory firms, today announced it has been named a Workday partner. Through this strategic partnership, BDO will help clients streamline and standardize their finance and HR operations, improving efficiency, visibility, and enhancing the end-user experience.
